sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CITBPKCL( PKCL_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), PKCL_COME_CODE VARCHAR(4), PKCL_TABL_ID VARCHAR(8), PKCL_COLM_ID VARCHAR(20), PKCL_SORT_NUMB NUMBER(10, 0), PKCL_COLM_NAME VARCHAR(80), PKCL_DATA_TYPE VARCHAR(12), PKCL_DATA_LENG VARCHAR(8), PKCL_COLM_ALGN CHAR(1), PKCL_WITH_SCRN VARCHAR(4), PKCL_DISP_ALLW CHAR(1), PKCL_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(20), PKCL_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), PKCL_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(20), PKCL_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CITBPKCL_PK PRIMARY KEY ( PKCL_CORP_CODE, PKCL_COME_CODE, PKCL_TABL_ID, PKCL_COLM_ID ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_CORP_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_COME_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_TABL_ID', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_COLM_ID', 'VARCHAR', 20 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_SORT_NUMB', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_COLM_NAME', 'VARCHAR', 80 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_DATA_TYPE', 'VARCHAR', 12 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_DATA_LENG', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_COLM_ALGN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_WITH_SCRN', 'VARCHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_DISP_ALLW', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_UPDT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 20 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_UPDT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_INIT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 20 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'CITBPKCL' , 'PKCL_INIT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'PKCL_CORP_CODE', '법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'PKCL_COME_CODE', '공법' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'PKCL_TABL_ID', 'TABLE ID' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'PKCL_COLM_ID', 'COLUMN ID' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'PKCL_SORT_NUMB', '순서' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'PKCL_COLM_NAME', 'COLUMN 명' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'PKCL_DATA_TYPE', '데이터 타입' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'PKCL_DATA_LENG', '데이터 길이' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'PKCL_COLM_ALGN', '정렬' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'PKCL_WITH_SCRN', '출력넓이_화면' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'PKCL_DISP_ALLW', '화면출력여부' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'PKCL_UPDT_DATE', '수정일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'PKCL_UPDT_CMAN', '수정자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'PKCL_INIT_DATE', '등록일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'PKCL_INIT_CMAN', '등록자' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02
